titles.title: Recognizing the importance of increasing renewable and alternative fuel use in reducing imports of foreign oil.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Air Quality.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1647)

bill.summary:
7/31/2008--Introduced.
Recognizes the importance of increasing renewable and alternative fuel use in reducing imports of foreign oil.
